home.title: Arm Wrestling Tournament Manager
home.description: Manage your arm wrestling tournaments, players, and matches with ease
home.featuresSubtitle: The ultimate platform for arm wrestling enthusiasts

tournamentManagement.title: Tournament Management
tournamentManagement.description: Organize professional armwrestling tournaments with custom weight classes and filters.

playerProfiles.title: Player Profiles
playerProfiles.description: Create detailed profiles, track performance, and manage hand preference and gender.

liveMatches.title: Live Matches
liveMatches.description: Run live brackets, confirm winners, and follow real-time progress.

statsAnalytics.title: Statistics & Analytics
statsAnalytics.description: View results and rankings; export players and generate PDFs.

intro.title: All-in-one platform for armwrestling tournaments
intro.description: Create tournaments with custom weight ranges, manage players with flexible filters, run live matches, and export localized PDFs with one click.

highlights.flexibleFilters: Flexible player filters (gender, hand, birth year)

s1.title: Create a tournament
s1.desc: Set divisions by weight and optional filters.

s2.title: Add players
s2.desc: Import or add quickly, manage by division.

s3.title: Run matches
s3.desc: Start fixtures, confirm winners, view ranks.

bottomCta.title: Ready to host your next Armwrestling event?
bottomCta.description: Spin up a professional tournament in minutes with WrestleMania Pro.

tournaments.title: Tournaments
tournaments.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this tournament?

tournaments.setupTournament: Set up your tournament with custom weight ranges and filters
tournaments.tournamentNamePlaceholder: e.g., Youth Men's Left Arm Championship
tournaments.yildizlarDescription: Tournament template for 13-15 year old male athletes
tournaments.yildizlarKizlarDescription: Tournament template for 13-15 year old female athletes
tournaments.genclerDescription: Tournament template for 16-18 year old male athletes
tournaments.genclerKizlarDescription: Tournament template for 16-18 year old female athletes
tournaments.gencBuyuklerDescription: Tournament template for 19-23 year old male athletes
tournaments.gencBuyuklerKizlarDescription: Tournament template for 19-23 year old female athletes
tournaments.buyuklerDescription: Tournament template for male athletes 24 years and older
tournaments.buyuklerKizlarDescription: Tournament template for female athletes 24 years and older
tournaments.masterDescription: Tournament template for male athletes 40 years and older
tournaments.masterKizlarDescription: Tournament template for female athletes 40 years and older

players.title: Players
players.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this player?
players.manageColumnsDescription: Open/close custom columns whose visibility you want to manage. You can also change visibility by clicking on the row.
players.confirmDeleteColumn: Are you sure you want to delete this column?
players.importExcelNote: Excel header mapping: Name → Name, Surname → Surname, Weight → Weight, Hand Preference → Hand Preference (right/left/right,left → Right,Left), Gender → Gender, Birthday → Birthday. Extra headers will be added as new columns.
players.clearAllDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all player data? This action cannot be undone.
players.importError: JSON could not be read or format is invalid: {error}
players.name: Name
players.activeMatchesDescription: View and manage active tournament matches

matches.title: Matches
matches.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this match?
matches.startTournamentMessage: Start a tournament from the Tournaments page to create a fixture
matches.deleteFixtureMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{fixtureName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
matches.resetTournamentConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the fixture? This action cannot be undone.
matches.viewResultsMessage: Click the button below to view results and rankings.

auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Password reset link sent to your email
auth.signUpSuccess: Sign up successful! Check your email.

opponentsModal.title: Match History
